maxPages.title: Max pages

maxDepth.description: Maximum link depth from start URLs

chunkOverlap.title: Chunk overlap (chars)
chunkOverlap.description: Overlap between consecutive chunks to preserve context

includeMetadata.title: Include metadata

removeNavigation.title: Remove navigation
removeNavigation.description: Remove nav, header, and footer elements for cleaner content

urlPatterns.title: URL patterns
urlPatterns.description: Glob patterns to filter which URLs to follow (e.g., 'https://docs.example.com/**')
